name: Cosmic Star Heroine (Sci-Fi/Spy RPG) for PC/Mac/PS4/Vita
blurb: New turn-based RPG from the creators of Cthulhu Saves the World. Inspired by Chrono Trigger, Phantasy Star & Suikoden. PC/Mac/PS4/Vita.

rewards.reward: No Reward
Registered Voter Tier! Voting rights - The ability to vote on periodic design polls presented to all of our backers!

Game Tier! A digital copy of the game on your choice of platform PSN, Steam (PC/Mac), or DRM-free PC/Mac. Note: PSN codes are for the North American PSN only at this time - we're trying to procure European codes as well and will post an update if we get confirmation there. Also all rewards in the $1 Registered Voter Tier!
Extras Tier! Digital strategy guide for the game, Cosmic Star Heroine wallpaper & forum avatars! Also all rewards in the $10 Game Tier!
Soundtrack Tier! Digital copy of the complete Cosmic Star Heroine soundtrack! Also all rewards in the $15 Extras Tier!

Zeboyd Tier! Digital copies of our previous games (Cthulhu Saves the World, Breath of Death VII, and Penny Arcade's On the Rain-Slick Precipice of Darkness 3 & 4) on Steam and a digital copy of the complete soundtrack to Precipice of Darkness 4! Also all rewards in the $20 Soundtrack Tier!
Art Book Tier! Digital art book for Cosmic Star Heroine and Special Thanks inclusion in the game's credits! Also all rewards in the $25 Zeboyd Tier!

Epiphany Tier! Second copy of the game and Digital PDFs of Molly the Were-Zompire & Epiphany in Spaaace! (Robert Boyd's Choose Your Own Adventure-style novels that were originally released on XBLIG, now with new edits & artwork). Also all rewards in the $30 Art Book Tier!
Sausage Tier! Early PC beta access to the game and Making Of Cosmic Star Heroine article after release. Also all rewards in the $40 Epiphany Tier!

Spy Tier! Be a part of the top secret spy directory that can be viewed in-game (includes your name or an alternate spy name you've chosen and a short 1-3 sentence description of your exploits)! Also all rewards in the $50 Sausage Tier!
T-Shirt Tier! Get a special Cosmic Star Heroine T-Shirt! Also all rewards in the $75 Spy Tier!
Poster Tier! Get a collection of 3 Posters (2 Cosmic Star Heroine-themed, 1 general Zeboyd Games-themed). Also all rewards in the $75 Spy Tier!

Fan-art tier! Your fan-art will be included in-game in an art gallery somewhere in the game's galaxy. Note: Art is subject to approval (can't be more adult than our content rating) and must be original work or related to one of our games (no one else's IP). Also all rewards in the $75 Spy Tier!

Were-Zompire Tier! Get a physical copy of Molly the Were-Zompire & Epiphany in Spaaace! (Robert Boyd's Choose Your Own Adventure-style novels that were originally released on XBLIG, now with new edits & artwork). Also all rewards in the $75 Spy Tier!

Monster Tier! Design a monster that will appear somewhere in-game. Note design is subject to approval (can't be more adult than our rating or derivative of someone else's IP). Also all rewards in the $75 Spy Tier!
Physical Art Book Tier! Includes a physical copy of the Cosmic Star Heroine art book! Also all rewards in the $75 Spy Tier!
Physical Tier! Get the poster collection, Cosmic Star Heroine T-Shirt, and Physical Copy of Molly the Were-Zompire & Epiphany in Spaaace! Also all rewards in the $75 Spy Tier!

Design Tier! Design a monster that will appear in game & your fan-art will be included in an in-game art gallery. Note subject to approval (See Monster & Fan-Art Tiers for details). Also all rewards in the $75 Spy Tier!

NPC Tier! Become an NPC in-game (or design an alter-ego if you'd rather not be in the game personally)! Plus you'll be included in a special "Patron of the Arts" thanks mention in the credits. Also all rewards in the $500 Physical Tier!

Assassin Tier! You (or an appropriately augmented alien or cyber version of you) will become an elite enemy assassin in-game! In short, you'll be a super-hard optional boss in the game. Plus you'll be included in a special "Patron of the Arts' Thanks mention in the credits. Also all rewards in the $500 Physical Tier plus the $350 Physical Art Book!

Secret Agent Tier! Become a recruitable character in-game (or design an alter-ego if you'd rather not be in the game personally)! This character will not be playable in-battle but is available to join your spy base & offer support. Also all rewards in the $1000 Patron of the Arts Tier!
